isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - Valves - Inspection

step1.para: Inspect each valve. Replace any valves that show evidence of burn marks, warp, scuffing, bending or tip pitting.
Measure the valve stem diameter at three locations at 120° intervals. Replace any valves that do not meet the specification.

Use the measurements from Step 2 to determine the valve stem-to-guide running clearance. Subtract the valve stem diameter from the valve guide inside diameter. Refer to Inspection, Valve Guides for the procedure to determine the valve guide inside diameter. Replace the valves that exceed the specification.
